inclusion.criterion: Patient eligible for reconstructive surgery after carcinological excision following a decision taken in a multidisciplinary consultation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Coverage by the Social Security system
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Surgical or anesthetic contraindication (physiological age, other proposed therapeutic options)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Subject incapable of full age or deprived of liberty
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Indication for chemotherapy with highly neurotoxic agents
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Inability to complete questionnaires or express feelings during the examination
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has CLL and large cell transformation, with a history of treatment with FCR, PCR, R-CVP, and Campath. He has had some response to therapy, but also some progression.
